Posts.EditableText:
Here's how I did it. msg ("A lady, interesting. Well, every character needs an epic name
worthy of them. What's yours?") get input { player.alias = result msg ("I will be speaking to you soon, " + player.alias) You get input and set it to the player's name. Then, you address the player as player.alias I hope this helps! :)
